artist: John Flaxman R.A.; Tommaso Piroli; William Blake; James Parker; Published by Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme, and Brown London
description: Bound album of 39 line engravings, plus title page; 1805 edition
provenance: Ruth Williams Bennett; given to MIA, 1995.
title: The Iliad of Homer Engraved from the Compositions of John Flaxman, R.A., Sculptor
